languages.text: "Я свидетельствую о том. Не было Волка отважнее и кровожаднее в той битве, чем Волк из стаи Зловещий вой".
"I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."
languages.original_text: "Я свидетельствую о том. Не было Волка отважнее и кровожаднее в той битве, чем Волк из стаи Зловещий вой".

traits.locale_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Famehungry."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Famehungry."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Famehungry."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

traits.locale_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: «Yo seré testigo. En esa batalla no hubo Lobo más valiente ni sanguinario que el del Aullido Torvo».
languages.original_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."

traits.locale_text: «Yo seré testigo. En esa batalla no hubo Lobo más valiente ni sanguinario que el Hambriento de fama».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: “我愿意证明这一切都是真的。在那场战斗中，没有比‘怒嚎者’狼群的乌尔法更英勇、更嗜血的野狼。”
languages.original_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意证明这一切都是真的。在那场战斗中，没有比‘渴名者’狼群的乌尔法更英勇、更嗜血的野狼。”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: 「私が証言しよう。あの戦闘では、破滅の咆哮のウルフほど勇敢で血に飢えたウルフはいなかった」
languages.original_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."

traits.locale_text: 「私が証言しよう。あの戦闘では、破滅の咆哮のウルフほど勇敢で血に飢えたウルフはいなかった」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: « Je témoignerai volontiers en votre faveur. Au cours de cette bataille, aucun Wolf ne s'est montré aussi vaillant et combatif que notre frère des Hurleurs sanguinaires, brave parmi les braves. »
languages.original_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."

traits.locale_text: « Je témoignerai volontiers en votre faveur. Au cours de cette bataille, aucun Wolf ne s'est montré aussi vaillant et combatif que notre frère des Dévoreurs de gloire, brave parmi les braves. »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Ich werde das bezeugen. In diesem Kampf gab es keinen Wolf, der tapferer oder blutrünstiger war als er von den Baleful Howl."
languages.original_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das bezeugen. In diesem Kampf gab es keinen Wolf, der tapferer oder blutrünstiger war als er von den Famehungry."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Ben varım, şahidim. O savaşta bu Uğursuz Uluma Kurdu'ndan daha yiğit ve kana susamışı yoktu."
languages.original_text: "I will bear witness to this. In that battle, there was no Wolf more valiant or bloodthirsty than he of the Baleful Howl."

traits.locale_text: "Buna şahitlik edeceğim. O savaşta Uğursuz Uluma'nın bu Kurt'undan daha yiğit ve kana susamış kimse yoktu."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
